title: 怎么使用plotme插件
author: add336633
txt_content: 开了个服务器，然后弄了个plotme插件，可是创建世界后，不知道怎么搞了，购买小区说，这不是格子世界，求方法

replies.txt_content:
How do I make a PlotMe world?

The two best plugins you can use for this, is Multiverse-Core and Multiworld. If you have Multiverse-Core, type this command to make a PlotMe world: 
/mv create plotworld normal -g PlotMe 
If you have Multiworld, type this command to make a PlotMe world: 
/mw create plotworld plugin:PlotMe
If you have a custom name for your PlotMe replace "plotworld" with your custom name.
不同多世界开的方法也不同
